meanings.definition: To regard with disgust or hatred.
meanings.sent1: I abhor the taste of broccoli.
meanings.sent3: The thought of eating bugs makes me abhor them.
meanings.sent4: His actions abhor me like nails on a chalkboard.
meanings.sent5: The smell of rotten eggs is something I truly abhor.

meanings.sent1: They abhor the idea of cheating in exams.
meanings.sent2: He abhors the thought of lying to his friends.
meanings.sent3: I abhor Mondays more than anything else.
meanings.sent4: The politician's lies abhor me to my core.
meanings.sent5: The sound of nails on a chalkboard is something I abhor intensely.
